name: Rémilia’s Quest
description:
How to Play Keyboard:

[Directional Arrows]: Move

[Z]: Jump

[X]: Bat Attack

[C]: Shuriken Platform

Gamepad:

[Left Stick]/[Directional Pad]: Move

[A]: Jump

[R1]/[R2]: Bat Attack

[L1]/[L2]: Shuriken Platform

Comment Jouer Clavier:

[Flèches Directionnelles]: Déplacement

[W]: Saut

[X]: Attaque Chauve-Souris

[C]: Plateforme Shuriken

Manette:

[Stick Gauche]/[Pavé Directionnel]: Déplacement

[A]: Saut

[R1]/[R2]: Attaque Chauve-Souris

[L1]/[L2]: Plateforme Shuriken
